title: David Lynch at Roxy Cinema
description: Screenings of David Lynch films at Roxy Cinema. $18 admission.

title: And Scene
description: A comedy show featuring actors and improvisors at Caveat. $18.76 with promo code ‘brick’ (reg. $24-25).

title: Movie Musical Mondays: West Side Story
description: A screening of West Side Story at Village East by Angelika. $19 admission.

title: Not a Boy, Not a Girl Comedy Show
description: A comedy show at Crystal Lake. $10 admission.

title: Brooklyn Chili Takedown 2025
description: A chili competition at Royal Palms Shuffleboard. $30 admission.

title: Covert Covers (A Book Swap)
description: A unique book swap event at NYC Resistor. Pay-what-you-wish admission ($5+ suggested).

title: Gotham Writers Workshop: Creative Writing 101
description: A creative writing workshop at P+T Knitwear Bookstore. Free admission.

title: Filmmaker Magazine Presents at the Paris Theater
description: A screening of The Daytrippers followed by a Q&A at the Paris Theater. $17 general, $15 seniors/students.

title: Two Birds, One Stone
description: A comedy workshop at Pine Box Rock Shop featuring new works. Free admission (donations welcome).

title: Disasterpiece Movie Night: Frankenhooker
description: A watch party for the movie Frankenhooker at Wonderville. Free admission.

title: You Are Not Alone: An Uplifting Show About Depression
description: A comedy show at Magnet Theater. $10 admission.

title: The Afrikan Poetry Theatre's Annual Black History Month Film Festival
description: A film festival at Museum of the Moving Image. $17.50 general, $12 seniors/students.
address: Museum of the Moving Image, Astoria

title: Strong Black Lead Series
description: A film series at the Paris Theater featuring strong black lead films. Free admission.

title: 53rd Dance on Camera Festival
description: A festival at Symphony Space showcasing dance films. $17 general, $14 seniors/students.

title: The Divorced Women's Film Festival: 'No Fault'
description: A film festival curated by Haley Mlotek at Metrograph. $17 admission.

title: Tales from the New Yorker
description: A film series at Film Forum featuring stories from The New Yorker. $17 admission.

title: Cheap Book Sale
description: A sale of new and used books, records, and CDs at Park Slope United Methodist Church. Free admission.

title: Resounding Silents: The Passion of Joan of Arc
description: A screening of the classic film with live score at Brooklyn Art Haus. $25 admission.

title: Harlem Brewing Company Beer Tasting + Cookbook Party
description: Join Celeste Beatty for a beer tasting and discussion of her new cookbook at Liz's Book Bar. $5 admission.

title: Kweendom
description: An LGBTQ+ comedy and storytelling show at Pete's Candy Store. Free admission (donations welcome).

title: Best Night Ever: Comedy Show and Party
description: A comedy show featuring various stand-up comedians at El Santo Taqueria. $12 advance, $16 day of.

title: Open to Work: An Unemployed Comedy Show
description: A comedy show featuring struggling comedians at Friends and Lovers. $10 admission.

title: A Drinking Game NYC: Jumanji
description: A drinking game comedy show reenacting the movie Jumanji at The Bell House. $25.05 admission.

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: A women-produced comedy show at Halyards. Free admission (tips welcome).
